A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson ruined it. It's up to JJ Abrams to save the trilogy that original Star Wars fans including myself have come to love. Please don't disappoint us. That being said\, I'm not holding out much hope for the next installment. Sadly\, I think that those of us who loved the original three films will never have our questions answered. Disney put its stamp on it. Enough Said.
